She believes her activities are going well because she is organized and because she tends to her customers in an affectionate way, almost like they were members of her family, and people appreciate her for this.

Maria is deeply grateful to Kiva lenders, because thanks to their help she will be able to buy more products for her soft drinks shop. She will buy fizzy drinks at wholesale price, thus succeeding in increasing her earnings and in improving her standard of living. In its turn, this will allow her to keep on fighting to make her biggest dream come true: “to offer a good education to her daughters”.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale beauty products and soft drinks

loans.name: Manuela Del Carmen

texts.es: Manuela tiene 43 años de edad es originaria de León, casada, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, madre de 4 hijos de los cuales solo dos están a su cargo, ella realizo estudios hasta el segundo año de secundaria. Inicio su actividad con una humilde panita de limones que se ponía a vender en el mercado de León luego con el poco dinero que sacaba de la venta de limones fue comprando otros verduras  que al igual las vendía en el mercado  hasta obtener lo que es hoy su propio puesto de frutas y verduras donde recibe el apoyo de su esposo y sus hijos, sus productos son comercializados , su expectativa es mantener su negocio y abastecerlo aun mas con productos. Solicita el préstamo para compra de materiales para mejorar su tramo y comprar frutas según la temporada y la flota el cual estima el crédito le ayudara ya que surtiendo el negocio con toda clase de frutas y verduras le generara más clientes obteniendo al mismo tiempo más ganancias, como planes futuros espera satisfacer a sus clientes con todos los productos que tengan más demanda.
texts.en:
Manuela, age 43, is originally from León.  She is married and the mother of four children, but only two of them are under her care.  Manuela is a merchant who sells fruits and vegetables.  She studied through the second year of high school.  

Manuela started her business with a modest pallet of lemons that she sold at the market in León.  With the money she earned from selling lemons, she was able to buy other vegetables that she also sold at the market.  Today she has her own fruit and vegetable stand.  Manuela receives help from her husband and children.  Her products are sold at the market, and her hope is to maintain her business and restock it with more products.  

She is requesting a loan to buy materials to improve her stand.  Manuel will also buy fruits according to the season.  The appreciating float from the loan will help to restock her business with all types of fruits and vegetables.  This will attract more customers and, at the same time, she will generate more earnings.  Her future plans include satisfying her customers with all of the products that they demand.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruits and construction materials for improving her stand.

loans.name: Simona

texts.es:
Simona es una mujer  de 29 años de edad, casada, con 03 hijos dependientes, vive en casa propia  en el Caserío Huaca de Mórrope ubicado a 20 minutos.
La actividad a la que se dedica Simona  es la venta de abarrotes en su domicilio como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, etc. y cuenta con clientes sólidos. Adicionalmente cría y vende aves de corral, alimentándoles sus animales con purina y maíz.
Su Cónyuge  se dedica al jornal y a la agricultura. Tiene sembrada 1 Ha de algodón en terreno de sus padres.
El monto del Crédito solicitado es de 2000 nuevos soles y será destinado para invertirlo en compra de abarrotes y para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de algodonero, el cual le ayudará a incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Simona is a 29-year-old woman who is married and has 3 dependent children. She lives in her own home in the Huaca de Morrope settlement, located 20 minutes from the loan office. Simona dedicates herself to selling groceries from her home, including rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, etc. She can count on dependable customers. In addition, she raises and sells farm fowl, feeding them chicken feed and corn. Her husband is a laborer and farm worker. Simona also has 1 hectare of her parents' land planted in cotton.

Simona is requesting a loan of 2,000 new sols, to invest in grocery merchandise, and to maintain her cotton field. This should help increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: buy groceries to stock her general store and to provide maintainance for her fields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a 290.59 gal. tank and to pay for repair works in his shop.

loans.name: Joseph G.

texts.en:
Joseph has been running a shop in Buchanan, where he sells fashion shoes, clothes, slippers, and other items. He started this business with help from his friends, and learned how to sell from his friends. At present, the problem he faces is the size of his shop; he needs a bigger shop to contain all of his goods, as he has more customers. He is requesting a loan to increase the size of his shop and buy more fashion shoes, slippers, clothes, and other items for his business. He enjoy his business because it makes him busy and popular.

Joseph is a college graduate, 28 years old, single, with two children, aged 3 and 5, who live at home (Buchanan). The oldest child is in school. His dream is to expand his business even more, send all his children to school, and build a house for them.

loans.use: to increase the size of his shop and buy more fashion shoes, slippers, clothes, and other items for his business.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en: Ahmad is a married 38-year-old man who lives with his 4 children and wife in Gaza.  In 2011, Ahmad opened a small business for decorating wedding cars.  He began by working at his house and his dream is to eventually have an office for his business.  Ahmad asked Ryada for funds to buy shelves and make simple decorations to attract his customers. He will be able to display more car accessories which will make it easier for his customers to decide on their order.

loans.use: to buy shelves and make simple decorations for his wedding car business.

loans.name: Dioscora

texts.en:
Dioscora is 59 years old and lives in Imelda, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 5 children.
Dioscora has a dress shop and earns approximately 5000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7000 PHP to purchase more inventory of clothes for her dress shop.

Dioscora has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Dioscora hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory of clothes for her dress shop.

loans.name: Efrina

texts.en:
Efrina is married with 8 children. She is 40 years old and lives in Cabangcalan, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.
Efrina sells charcoal to earn a living and has had this business for 1 year. Each month she earns 6000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 7000 PHP to purchase more charcoal for her business.
Efrina has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Efrina hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her retail business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay rent for a new cafeteria location

loans.name: Dionisia Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Dionisia consuelo, es casada comerciante se dedica a venta de granos básicos,  inicia sus labores desde las 6 am y finaliza hasta las 4 pm.  Ella realiza este tipo de trabajo para ayudar a su esposo a la mantención del  hogar. 
 
Este crédito lo solicito  para la compra de dulce y sardinas enlatadas, compro este tipo de productos debido a que se acercaba la semana santa.

Dionisia  esta agradecida con Ceprodel por que le ha ayudado a incrementar su inventario confía en Dios que nuestra institución le pueda seguir ayudando a crecer.
texts.en:
Dionisia Consuelo is married.  She’s a merchant.  She sells basic grains at the local market where she starts her work day at 6am and ends at 4pm.  She does this type of work in order to help her husband support their home.  

She asked for this loan to buy candy and canned sardines.  She bought this type of product because Holy Week was approaching.  

Dionisia is grateful to Ceprodel because it helped her increase inventory.  She trusts in God that our institution will continue helping her to grow.

loans.use: to buy milk and sardines.

loans.name: Kalbubu

texts.ru:
Калбубу 51 год, замужем, имеет 4 детей. Калбубу на протяжении 13 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки телки. Благодаря упорному труду Калбубу в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 корова с теленком, 5 овец с ягнятами, 5 коз и 1 лошадь.  Ежемесячная прибыль с продажи молочных продуктов составляет 5,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойной коровы, что позволит ей увеличить надои.  Доходы от кредита Калбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kalbubu is 51 years old, married and has four children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for 13 years, having started this business with a purchase of a heifer.  Thanks to Kalbubu's hard work, today her business contains one cow with a calf, five sheep with lambs, five goats and one horse.  The monthly profit from sales of milk products amounts to 5,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Kalbubu requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy a dairy cow, which will allow her to increase milk volumes.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of domestic livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Kundus

texts.ru:
Кундус 41 год, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Кундус на протяжении 16 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки трех овец. Благодаря упорному труду Кундус в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  2 коровы, 3 теленка, 6 овец с ягнятами. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Кундус обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои и 1 бычка но откорм.  Доходы от кредита Кундус планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Kundus is 41 years old, married and has three children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for 16 years, having started this business with a purchase of three sheep.  Thanks to Kundus' hard work, today her business has two cows, three calves and six sheep with lambs.  In order to further develop her business, Kundus requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy dairy cows, which will allow her to increase milk volumes, and one bull for fattening up.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of domestic livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Visitacion

texts.en:
Visitacion is 58 years old and lives in Lamao, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 3 children.
Visitacion owns a dress shop and earns approximately 2000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10000 PHP to purchase more stocks of clothes for her dress shop.
Visitacion has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Visitacion hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory of clothes for her dress shop.

loans.name: Pilar Jane

texts.en:
Pilar Jane is 24 years old and lives in Palomoc, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay. She is married with 2 children.
Pilar Jane sells gasoline and earns approximately 5000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for additional capital to purchase gasoline to resell.
Pilar Jane is a new member of PMPC. In the future, Pilar Jane hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more gasoline to resell.

loans.name: Nurgul

texts.ru:
Нургуль 47 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Нургуль на протяжении 22 лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с покупки телки. Благодаря упорному труду Нургуль в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний  день имеется  1 корова с теленком, 10 овец с ягнятами и 1 лошадь.  Ежемесячная прибыль с продажи молочных продуктов составляет 7,000 сом . 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нургуль обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку дойных коров, что позволит ей увеличить надои и 1 бычка на откорм.  Доходы от кредита Нургуль планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение домашней скотины.
texts.en: Nurgul is 47 years old, married and has three children.  She has been involved in animal husbandry for 22 years, having started this business with a purchase of a heifer.  Thanks to Nurgul's hard work, today her business contains one cow with a calf, ten sheep with lambs and one horse.  The monthly profit from sales of milk products amounts to 7,000 som.  In order to further develop her business, Nurgul requested a loan in the amount of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy dairy cows, which will allow her to increase milk volumes, and one bull for fattening up.  She plans to invest the earnings from the loan into a continued increase of domestic livestock quantities.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Luis Alfonso

texts.es: El señor Luis es habitante del municipio de Ticuantepe, junto a su esposa la cual, es comerciante de frutas y verduras para apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar, los planes hacia un futuro es mejorar las condiciones de vida, ya que su mayor sueño es poder mejorar su casita y gozar de una vida digna ya que han sido varios años de lucha trabajando bajo el sol para poder llevar el pan de cada día a su familia, don Luis desde hace varios años trabaja con el cultivo de piña , la mayor afectación que se le presentan son las plagas que invaden el cultivo. El préstamo lo necesita para la compra de fertilizantes e insumos .
texts.en:
Luis lives with his wife in the Ticuantepe municipality.  His wife sells fruits and vegetables to help him with the household expenses.  

The plan for his family's future is to be able to improve their living conditions by improving his home and enjoying a dignified life.  

He has spent many years working under the sun every day to provide for his family.  He has been working as a pineapple farmer for many years.  

His largest worry is that pests will invade his harvest.  He will use this loan to buy fertilizers and supplies for his harvest.

loans.use: compra de fertilizantes e insumos

loans.name: Iroda

texts.ru: Ироде 33 года,проживает в селе Саидкурган, умная, молодая девушка и отличный предприниматель.В 1998 году начала свой бизнес на продовольственном рынке со стартовой суммы 240 сомони. Она хорошо ознакомлена с трудностями бизнеса и имеет хороший опыт  в этой деятельности. Ирода постепенно развивала свой бизнес и на данный момент имеет магазин продуктов питания в своем родном селе Саидкурган. В селе ее хорошо знают и у нее много постоянных клиентов. С 2003 года она постоянная клиентка "Арванд" и ни разу не нарушала условия кредитования и показала себя с хороший стороны. В течении кредитования она расширила свой бизнес до 12500 сомони. Она очень благодарна "Арванду" за своевременную поддержку и в дальнейшим она будет сотрудничать с нашей организацией. С целью расширения бизнеса она хочет получить кредит в размере 1000 сомони и она надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Iroda is 33 years old and lives in the Saidkurgan village.  She is a smart young woman and an excellent entrepreneur.  She started her business at a food market in 1998 with an initial sum of 240 somoni.  She is well aware of the business difficulties and has a good experience in this field.  Iroda gradually developed her business and currently has a food store in her native Saidkurgan village.  She is well known in her village and has many regular customers.  She has been a regular client of "Arvand" since 2003, never violated financing terms and showed herself well.  Iroda grew her business during the financing period to 12,500 somoni.  She is very grateful to "Arvand" for the timely support and plans to partner with our organization in the future.  In order to expand her business, Iroda wants to obtain a loan in the amount of 1000 somoni and relies on your support.

loans.use: to expand her business

loans.name: Flora

texts.en:
Flora is married with 1 child. She is 48 years old and lives in Lumbayao, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte.
Flora sells bananas to earn a living and has had this business for 10 years. Each month she earns 5000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 14900 PHP to purchase more bananas for her retail business.
Flora has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Flora hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas for her retail business.

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Benita is 41 years old and lives in Baybay, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 2 children.
Benita works in the fish industry and sells fish for a living; she has been doing this for 20 years. She requested a loan of 15000 PHP to purchase boxes of fish to sell/retail.
Benita has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Benita hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase boxes of fish to sell/retail.

loans.name: Oscar Jose

texts.es: Oscar tiene 38 años de edad, originario de Estelí, casado, padre de 2 hijos los cuales están a su cargo, de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de pan. Su actividad inicia desde hace 2 años con capital propio que le dejo la mama ya que falleció y el decidió quedarse con la venta de pan para poder seguir adelante, en el negocio recibe el apoyo de su  esposa, sus productos los comercializa en Condega municipio de Estelí, sus expectativa es mantener la venta de pan debido a que le va muy bien, le ha generado ganancias que le han ayudado a salir adelante. Solicita el préstamo para comprar harina, azúcar, levadura, aceite y todos los insumos necesarios para la elaboración del pan, el estima que el crédito le ayudara ya que podrá ofrecer diferentes productos que le permitirán vender más para obtener una mejor ganancia, como planes futuros espera comprar un horno industrial y un soplete para disminuir sus costos, sus metas próximas es comprar un bus para poder distribuirle su pan a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Oscar is 38 years old.  He is a native of Estelí, is married, and has 2 children, both of whom still live with him.  He makes a living selling bread.  Oscar started his business 2 years ago with money he inherited from his mother when she passed away, and he chose to carry on by staying in the baking business.  His wife helps him with his work.  He sells his products in the city of Condega in the department of Estelí.  Oscar hopes to continue selling bread, since his business is going very well and it has generated enough profits to help him get ahead.  

Oscar is asking for a loan to purchase flour, sugar, yeast, oil, and the other ingredients he needs for making bread.  He says that the loan will help him by allowing him to offer more products, which will increase his sales and thus enable him to earn higher profits.  In the future he hopes to purchase an industrial oven and a compressor in order to lower his costs.  Oscar’s long-term goal is to purchase a bus so he can distribute bread more easily to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, yeast, and oil.

loans.name: Mujeres Responsables Group

texts.es: El Banco Comunal Mujeres Responsable está conformado por once emprendedores que ya han venido trabajando con Fundación León 2000, durante el crédito han demostrado ser personas responsable y sobre todo emprendedores dispuesto a luchar por sus objetivos de crecer cada día, este grupo es muy unido se apoyan unos a otros. Nora Janixia es una emprendedora que es parte de este grupo y su actividad a la que se dedica es a la venta de artesanía en barro y está solicitando financiamiento para comprar materiales para la elaboración de las artesanías y poder ofrecerles a sus clientes variedad.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Responsables” (Responsible Women) communal bank is composed of eleven entrepreneurs who have been working with Fundación León 2000 and during the loan term have shown themselves to be responsible and, above all, enterprising people willing to work hard for their objectives of growing every day.  This group is very unified and mutually supportive.

Nora Janixia is one of the entrepreneurs who is part of this group and the activity she carries out is selling clay crafts.  She’s asking for the loan to buy crafts making supplies to be able to offer her customers more variety.

loans.use: to buy crafts making supplies.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol tiene 31 años de edad, convive con su pareja y tiene 2 hijos. Ella trabaja muy duro vendiendo comida en un puesto ambulante que tiene en una feria de la ciudad.

La señora Marisol necesita de un préstamo para implementar su negocio y comprar sillas, mesas, ollas, cubertería y  otros implementos para mejorar la atención en su establecimiento, y así en un futuro poner un restaurante completo y propio.

Marisol pertenece al Banco comunal “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.
texts.en:
Marisol, 31, lives with her spouse and she has two children.  She works very hard selling food from a food cart she has in one of the city’s street markets.

Marisol needs a loan to equip her business and to buy tables, chairs, pots, cutlery and other supplies to improve customer service in her establishment so that in the future she can open a complete restaurant of her own.

Marisol belongs to the “Señor de los Temblores II” (Lord of Earthquakes II) communal bank in the city of Cusco-Perú.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, pots, cutlery and other equipment to improve customer service.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en:
Loreta is 51 years old and lives in Mialen, Clarin. She is married and has 11 children. 
Loreta has a store that sells a variety of products; she has had this business for 10 years. Loreta requested a loan of 14900 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.
Loreta has been a member of PMPC for one year.  In the future, Loreta hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en:
Anastacia is 60 years old and lives in Kalasan, Pagadian City. She is widowed with four children.                                                                                                       Anastacia has a shop that sells a variety of goods; she has had this business for three years. She requested a loan of 14000 PHP to purchase more inventory for her general store. 

Anastacia has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Anastacia hopes to expand her business in other villages.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory for her general store.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin lives in Buchanan. He is 32 years old, single, and has two children, aged 2 and 4. The older one is in school, while the younger one is looked after by his mother at home.

Edwin has been running a shop where he sells cell phones, electronics, phone accessories, and other items. He started this business through his friends and learned it from his friends. He is asking for a loan to buy more cell phones and other items for his business. He enjoys how his business makes him popular. The problem that he faces is a small amount of commodities, as he has more customers. He plans to expand his business even more and send all his children to school.

loans.use: to buy more cell phones and other items for his business.

loans.name: Rahmonali

texts.ru: Рахмонали проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается частным извозом. Этим видом деятельности занимается уже 20 лет. Кредит берет для ремонта автомашины. Он хочет поменять старые запчасти на новые.
texts.en: Rahmonali lives in the city of Kulob.  He is 43 years old, married and has two children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Rahmonali is involved in private transportation.  He has been in this business for 20 years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car.  He wants to replace old parts with new ones.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр житель города Куляб. Он женат. Ему 28 лет. Он предоставляет услугу, такси. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для проведения свадебных мероприятий. Он хочет выдать замуж свою сестру.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 28 years old and married.  He provides a taxi service and has been in this business for two years.  Bakhtiyor is requesting this loan to hold a wedding.  He wants to marry off his sister.

loans.use: to hold a wedding

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 36 años de edad, casada, con 05 hijos dependientes, vive en casa propia en el Caserío Lagartera ubicado a 15 minutos de la ciudad de Mórrope.
La actividad  que realiza Rosa  es la crianza y venta de animales, los cuales cría en la parte exterior de su domicilio, y  alimenta a sus animales con polvillo, purina, maíz y pastos naturales. Quincenalmente negocia sus animales, los cuales vende en el mercado de Chiclayo y Lambayeque.
Su Cónyuge  se dedica a la joyería y además es guardián en el colegio secundario de su caserío.
El monto del Crédito solicitado es de 2000 nuevos soles y será destinado para invertirlo en la compra de alimentos para sus animales y en golosinas para vender en el colegio.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 36 year old married woman with five dependent children.  She lives in her own house in Lagartera settlement 15 minutes from the city of Mórrope.

The activity that Rosa carries out is raising animals to sell; she raises them in her yard and feeds them ‘polvillo’ [animal feed made from rice], Purina, corn and natural grasses.  She sells her animals every two weeks in the markets in Chiclayo and Lambayeque.  Her spouse works in jewelry and also works as a caretaker at the local secondary school.

The amount of the loan requested is 2000 new soles that she will use to buy feed for her animals and snacks to sell at the school.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Jorgelina

texts.es:
Jorgelia es viuda vive en Ciudad del Este, comenta que sus hijos ya son mayores todos independientes a ella.
Ella tiene un  negocio, una despensa bien surtida en su casa. Ella es muy conocida en su comunidad por su amabilidad, y su buen trato con sus clientes. Ella se inicio con un dinero que junto con otros trabajos anteriores, mes a mes va aumentando su negocio con los ingresos de su despensa y sumado a su trabajo. Ella es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu  emprendedor que no cabe duda que va a llegar a conseguir todas las metas que se ha propuesto.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, bebidas, lácteos, panificados, verduras y demás insumos para mantener bien surtida su despensa.
texts.en:
Jorgelia is a widow living in Ciudad del Este.  She comments that her children are all adults now and live independently.

She has a business, a well-stocked, home-based grocery store.  She is very well known in her community because of her kindness and the good treatment she gives her customers.  She started with some money she saved from other jobs.  Month to month she is increasing the business with income from the store added to her work.  She is a very responsible person who very much wants to improve.  She has an entrepreneurial spirit which undoubtedly will lead her to reach all the goals she’s set for herself.

She’s asking for the loan to buy meat, beverages, dairy products, baked goods, vegetables and other supplies needed to keep the store well-stocked.

loans.use: to buy meat, beverages, dairy products, vegetables, baked goods and other supplies.

loans.name: One Word Group

texts.en:
Ramatu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs. Ramatu was born in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone, about 26 years ago. She is married to a businessman, and the couple has two children who are attending primary schools.

For over seven years, Ramatu has been selling food – palm oil, (the most popular cooking oil), tomatoes, cooking oil, margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), salt, etc. With the help of this loan, she and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve their living conditions. Ramatu will use her share of the loan (500,000 SLL) to buy the above-mentioned items in bulk to add to her business.

loans.use: to buy palm-oil, tomatoes, cooking oil, margi, salt, etc. in bulk

loans.name: Nestor

texts.es:
Nestor es de la ciudad de Pilar, hace un año que está ejerciendo la profesión de Odontólogo, es soltero sin hijos, vive en casa de sus padres donde también tiene su consultorio totalmente equipado. Su papá es Abogado y su mamá Docente, es el menor de cinco hermanos.- Todos los demás hermanos ya no viven con sus padres ya que todos han formado su familia y todos son profesionales. Es una persona joven muy trabajadora y emprendedora.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para poder abastecer su negocio y de esa forma ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes.Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que está recibiendo, pues le será de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Néstor is from the city of Pilar.  He’s been working as a dentist for the last year.  He’s single and has no children.  He lives in his parents’ house where he has his completely equipped dental office.  His father is an attorney and his mother is a teacher.  He’s the youngest of five siblings.  None of his other siblings still live with his parents since they’ve all formed their own families and they are all professionals.  He is a hardworking and enterprising young man.

He is asking for the loan to buy supplies to stock his business thus offering better customer service.  He is grateful to the Fundación and to Kiva for the opportunity he’s getting because it will of great help to him.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his dental office.

loans.name: Adiza

texts.en:
Adiza cooks kenkey (fermented corn dough wrapped in corn or banana leaves). She serves it with fried fish, pepper, and tomato sauce at Esuekyir, near Abura. She is married and has two children. 

Adiza has been in this business for five years now.  She uses her income for the general upkeep of their children. Adiza will use her loan to purchase bags of maize and fish, which she uses in preparing her kenkey for sale. She hopes to use the new profit from her expanded business to have a better stall for the sale of her kenkey.

loans.use: to purchase bags of maize and fish, which she uses in preparing her kenkey for sale.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es:
El Víctor tiene 28 años de edad es soltero y vive con su madre en la ciudad de Carapeguá. Víctor proviene de una familia humilde y  trabajadora, su padre se dedica a la construcción y él como su ayudante. Pero después de mucho trabajar  logró montar un pequeño lavadero de vehículo ya que en la zona no había dicho servicio. Hoy en día ya amplió su negocio con la venta de repuestos para motocicleta y le va muy bien en ambos negocios ya que prácticamente es el único de la zona.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra cubiertas, lubricantes, aro, pistón y otros, con lo que podrá abastecerse y de esa forma ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Víctor is 28 years old, single and living with his mother in the city of Carapeguá.  Víctor comes from a humble, hardworking family.  His father works in construction and he works as his helper.  But after much work he managed to open a small car wash because there was no such service available in the zone.  Today, he’s expanded the business with the sale of motorcycle spare parts and he does very well in both businesses since he’s practically the only one in the zone.

He’s asking for the loan to buy hubcaps, lubricants, rims, pistons and others to stock up in order to provide good customer service.

loans.use: to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Etelgive

texts.es: Doña Etelgive es una señora con 45 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos mayores de edad. Es una señora muy trabajadora y emprendedora, con muchos deseos de crecer y salir adelante a nivel personal y de negocio. Se enteró de los servicios que ofrece Fundación Mujer por medio de otra clienta. Se dedica a confeccionar ropa de cama, cortinas y pijamas para la venta, también cose a la medida. Cuenta con el apoyo de su hija en las temporadas altas de costuras. Su meta es generar ingresos para poder tener un negocio grande y asi ayudar a otras personas con darles empleo. En el transcurso de su actividad ha tenido obstáculos como lo es la falta de capital de trabajo para la demanda que ha tenido pero ahora lo supera con el financiamiento que va obtener por medio de la Fundación.
texts.en: Etelgive is 45 years old, is married, and has two adult children.  She is a very hard-working and enterprising woman who has aspirations to grow and get ahead, both in terms of her business and on a personal level.  She first learned about the services that Fundación Mujer offers from another customer.  Etelgive makes a living producing and selling bed linen, curtains, and pajamas; she also offers sewing services.  Her daughter helps her during the peak fashion season.  Her goal is for her business to be large enough that she can help others by offering them employment.  Etelgive has faced a number of challenges in the course of her work, such as not having enough working capital to keep up with demand.  Now, though, she can overcome that obstacle thanks to the funding she can receive through Fundación Mujer.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and two sewing machines.

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
10 mujeres de la ciudad de Santaní se han unido con el objetivo de trabajar juntas y por medio de ese trabajo poder ayudarse las unas a las otras. Ellas son personas muy trabajadoras y emprendedoras, y vieron en el programa de la fundación paraguaya una gran ayuda para ellas y sus familias, ya que no quieren que pasen por las mismas necesidades por las que ellas tuvieron que pasar.
Paulina tiene una Verdulería y nos comenta que tiene todo tipo de verduras de estación y con ello se gana la vida y puede ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora y su deseo es poder seguir creciendo para mejorar sus ingresos y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para abastecerse con tomates, locotes, cebollas, lechugas y demás verduras, para poder ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ten women from the city of Santaní have joined together with the objective of working together and by means of this work be able to help each other out.  They are very hardworking and enterprising and saw in Fundación Paraguaya a great help for them and their families because they don’t want them to go through the same privations they’ve had to go through.

Paulina has a vegetable stand where she tells us she sells seasonal vegetables earning her livelihood this way and to be able to help her family.  She is a very hardworking, enterprising person and her wish is to continue growing to improve her income and thus continue to help her family.

She’s asking for the loan to buy tomatoes, peppers, onions, lettuce and other vegetables to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Rosalita Group

texts.en:
Rosalita is 65 years old, married, and has five children.  She lives in Dela Paz, Clarin. Rosalita has a store that sells a variety of products, which she has been operating for five years. 

Rosalita is requesting a loan for 7,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents. She has been a member of PMPC for seven years.  In the future, Rosalita hopes to expand her business.

Rosalita is the leader of a two-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to purchase products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.es: Vivian de 54 años de edad se dedica al oficio de confecciones, negocio que inició desde hace 15 años, cuando quedó en estado de viudez y debió acudir a él, para genera ingresos que le permitieran sostener su familia y con ello ha logrado hoy,  que sus hijos estudien y trabajen. En su negocio ofrece las líneas de ropa para caballeros, para damas e infantil y hasta ha incursionado últimamente en la línea de uniformes para oficinas o ropa industrial. En la actualidad ha recibido 5 financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización a la que ha estado vinculada desde hace 8 años, y con la que ha logrado incrementar sus ingresos, porque con nuevo capital de trabajo hay más inversión, más productos, mas ventas y mas ingresos. Su meta más adelante es tener una boutique, donde trabaje sus clientes uno a uno y logre captar la exclusividad con la que amerita su clientela que trabaje. Su mayor desafío es no tener el suficiente capital de trabajo parea hacer inversiones conforme  a sus sueños. Esto es la razón de su credikiva, sexto financiamiento que hace a la Fundación, con el cual planea comprar telas e insumos para confeccionar uniformes, para lo cual la han contratado y esta inversión será exitosa gracias a que es sobre un pedido y comprará  de contado y con mejores precios que disminuirán sus costos.
texts.en:
Vivian is 54 years old and works as a seamstress.  She started her business 15 years ago when she was widowed and needed to generate income to support her family.  She has succeeded, since her children are in school and working.  Her business offers lines of clothing for men, women, and children, and she recently started a line of uniforms for offices and industrial work.  

She has received five loans from the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization she has been affiliated with for eight years.  She has been able to increase her income because with new working capital, there is more investment, more products, more sales, and more income.  

Her dream in the future is to have a boutique where she can work with her customers one on one and capture the exclusivity that her customers merit.  Her biggest struggle is not having enough working capital to make investments in line with her dreams.  This is the reason she has requested a sixth loan from the Foundation.  She plans to purchase fabric and supplies to make uniforms that she has been contracted for.  This loan will be successful because it is about an order and she will make the purchases with cash so she will get better prices, and this will decrease her costs.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and supplies to make uniforms.

loans.name: Safar

texts.ru: Сафар уже три года как занимается скотоводством. Ему 53 года. Он в основном разводит мелко - рогатый и курпнорогатый скот. Сафар женат. У него трое детей. Он берет кредит для закупа телят.
texts.en: Safar has been involved in animal husbandry for three years.  He is 53 years old.  He primarily breeds small livestock and cattle.  Safar is married and has three children.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Kuña Kyrey Group

texts.es:
El comité “Kuña Kyre’y” se formó con la unión de varias vecinas de la ciudad de  Santaní, ellas son personas muy trabajadoras y con ganas de salir adelante. Tienen un gran espíritu emprendedor y luchador.
Teodula es una persona muy sacrificada y trabajadora, ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de todo tipo de productos, como ser medias, frazadas, sabanas y demás, gracias a lo cual puede ayudar a su familia y darles lo que necesitan para que no tengan que pasar por ningún tipo de necesidades.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de frazadas, sabanas, medias y demás, para poder vender y no quedarse sin stock de esos productos. Ella y su grupo agradecen por la ayuda que están recibiendo de Kiva y de fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
The “Kuña Kyre’y” committee was formed when several neighbors from the city of Santaní joined together.  They are very hard working people who want to get ahead.  They have great entrepreneurial and tenacious spirits.

Teódula is a very self-sacrificing, hardworking person.  She sells all sorts of things from place to place like socks, blankets, sheets and others.  Thanks to this she’s able to help her family and to give them what they need so that they don’t have to go through any privations.

She’s asking for the loan to buy blankets, sheets, socks and others to sell and to not run out of stock.  She and her group are grateful for the help they are getting from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy blankets, sheets, socks and others.

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El comité Oñondivepa  nace mediante la gestión de una de las miembros. Este grupo es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo, y son muy destacadas en su barrio por la unión que ellas muestran a la hora de hacer actividades en conjunto.
La Sra. Lourden, es una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora y por sobre todo muy optimista e inculca a las integrantes de su comité a salir adelante. Lourden es comerciante, ella tiene una mercería, donde vende todo tipo de artículos, como ser prendas, calzados, artículos de bazar y demás insumos, y es gracias a esta buena variedad que tiene muy buena clientela.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de artículos de bazar y calzados, con lo cual tendrá mejor variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes. Ella está contenta por la ayuda que está recibiendo de la fundación y de Kiva.
texts.en:
The “Oñondivepa” committee was born thanks to one of the member’s actions.  This group is from the city of San Lorenzo and they stand out in their neighborhood because of the unity they display when they do group activities.

Lourden is an enterprising, hardworking woman but above all is very optimistic and she encourages her fellow members to get ahead.   Lourden is a merchant.  She has a general store where she sells all types of items like clothes, shoes, kitchenware and other supplies.  Thanks to the good variety she has a large clientele.

She’s asking for the loan to buy kitchenware and shoes to have more variety available to sell to her customers.  She is happy with the help she’s getting from the Fundación and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise and shoes to sell.

loans.name: Mayamu

texts.en: Mayamu is 28 years old and lives in Gardnersville. She is married with three children between the ages of 2 and 8; the two oldest ones attend school. For six years, she has been selling bread, rice, cream and other item. She likes the way her customers respond to her business. She is requesting a loan to buy more bread, rice, cream and other items for her business. Her plan is to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more beard, rice cream and others items for her business

loans.name: Ruzimurod

texts.ru: Рузимурод житель города Куляб. Ему 48 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Он занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности занимается уже три года. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Ruzimurod is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 48 years old, married and has five children.  He is involved in animal husbandry.  Ruzimurod has been in this business for three years.  He is requesting this loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Merab

texts.en:
Merab is 43 years old, married, and has five children.  She lives in Sto. Nino, Pagadian City. To earn a living, Merab has a business selling  different type of foods. She earns about 20,000 PHP a month. 

Merab is requesting a loan for 50,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase more raw ingredients for her business.  She has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, Merab would like to expand her business and own a restaurant.

loans.use: to purchase more raw ingredients for her business.

loans.name: El Arbolito Group

texts.es:
Doris es integrante del grupo "El Arbolito" conformado por 04 vecinas y compañeras de trabajo. El padre de Doris fue quien le facilitó el capital para empezar su negocio, su esposo la animó y ayudó debido a que ella sentía temor por su inexperiencia en ese tipo de negocio, después de 08 años puede ver los resultados de su trabajo que le ha permitido superarse. Ahora tiene  un carro y un  moto taxi que  alquila para transporte público,  también pudo implementar su bodega comprando una refrigeradora y congeladora, en la actualidad su bodega esta mas grande y surtida, es muy visitada por los moradores de su zona que acuden a comprarle los diversos productos que vende, su trabajo le ha permitido brindarle  a sus hijos una buena educación, para más adelante quiere formar una empresa de autos para alquiler, esta vez usará su préstamo para la compra de productos para su bodega. 

*Doris viste polo azul oscuro, es la segunda de la izquierda.
texts.en:
“El Arbolito” (The Little Tree) is a new group composed by four neighbors and coworkers.  

Doris’ father gave her the capital to start her business and her husband encouraged and helped her because she was a little fearful due to her lack of experience in this type of business.  After 8 years though she’s able to see that she’s been able to improve herself as a result of her work.  

Now she owns a car and a mototaxi that she leases out to provide public transportation and her store is now larger and better stocked; it’s quite popular with local residents who come by to purchase the various products she sells.  

Her work has allowed her to provide her children with a good education.  In the future she’d like to establish a car rental firm but this time she’ll use the loan to buy stock merchandise for her store.

*Doris is wearing a blue shirt; she’s second from the left.

loans.use: to purchase products for her general store

loans.name: Abashizehamwe Ii Group

texts.fr:
Evariste  fait partie du groupe Abashizehamwe et habite à Bujumbura. Il a 35 ans et est marié à Speciose. Ensemble ils ont  7 enfants, âgés  de 1  à  15 ans.

Il  fait le commerce de restaurant (haricot,  riz, patate douce cuits,...)  depuis 10 ans.

C’est son premier crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de produts vivriers(haricot,riz,patate douce,...) de son restaurant, à revendre cuits, pour gagner plus.

Les gains tirés du commerce, lui permettent d’améliorer ses conditions de vie.
texts.en:
Evariste is a member of the Abashizehamwe group and lives in Bujumbura.  He is 35 years old and married to Speciose.  The couple have seven children who are between 1 and 15 years old.

Evariste has been in the restaurant business (beans, rice, cooked sweet potatoes...) for 10 years.  This is his first loan from Turame.  He will use his Kiva loan to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of food products (beans, rice, sweet potatoes...) for his restaurant.  He will cook them and sell them in order to earn more money.

The profits he makes in his business allow him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a large quantity of food products (beans, rice, sweet potatoes...) for his restaurant

loans.name: Banco Mujer Shekhinná Group

texts.es:
Doña María  es una de las integrantes de Banco Mujer Shekhinná,  un grupo nuevo formado en la zona de Cariari, y el nombre significa “La unción de Dios está con nosotros”.
Esta señora tiene 46 años, vive en unión libre y tiene 3 hijos, de los cuales solo 2 viven con ella, los menores de edad, su compañero trabaja en una finca bananera como peón agrícola, y entre los dos luchan por sacar adelante la familia. 
Este es el primer crédito que Doña María solicita, y ella se dedica a las costura, confecciona ropa  a la medida, así como manteles, cortinas, juegos de sabana y otros, también elabora prendas tejidas a mano. Y el crédito se va a utilizar en la compra de materia prima para la producción de sus prendas. Como dato importante podemos resaltar que actualmente Doña María  tiene un pedido grande de sus productos, para mostrarlos en un canal de televisión nacional. 
El crédito representa una ayuda muy importante que le va a permitir invertir en su microempresa, y poder aumentar los ingresos de su hogar, ayudar con los estudios de sus hijos, y mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y su familia. 
Junto a ella están 7 socias más que van a invertir en actividades comerciales y agropecuarias.
texts.en:
María is a member of the Shekhinná women's bank.  This is a new group that has been set up in Cariari.  The group's name means 'God is with us'.

This lady is 46 years old, lives with her partner and has three children, only two of whom live with her (her youngest).  Her partner works on a banana plantation as an agricultural laborer.  Between them, the couple work hard to provide for their family.

This is the first loan that María has requested.  She works as a seamstress, making made-to-measure clothes and also tablecloths, drapes, sheet sets, etc.  In addition, she knits clothes by hand.  She will use her loan to buy raw materials for making her products.  We feel it important to point out that María currently has a large order for her products which will be shown on a national television channel.

This loan will be a great help as it will allow María to invest in her small business, increase her household income, help with her children's education and improve her family's quality of life.

There are seven additional members in this group who will invest in different commercial and agricultural business activities.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for making clothes and soft furnishings for the home

loans.name: Lovely Group

texts.en: Lorna is married with 2 children. She is 43 years old and lives in the Philippines. Lorna is a farmer who grows rice to earn a living. She has been doing this for ten years. She has requested a loan of PHP 6000 to purchase fertilizer for her farm. Lorna has been a member of PMPC for three years. In the future, she hopes for a good harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for her farm

loans.name: Speed Center Group

texts.en:
Jessica is 39 years old and lives in Sebucao, Dumalinao ZDS. She is married with 5 children.

Jessica is a vendor with a fish business. She earns approximately PHP 7000 each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to purchase more fish to sell.

Jessica has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, she hopes to becomes a successful woman.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Potenciana Group

texts.en:
Erlinda is a widow with three children. She is 59 years old and lives in Buenavista, Pagadian City.

Erlinda sells foods and different kinds of commodities to earn a living. She has had this business for 10 years. Each month, she earns PHP 15,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase more stock for her general store.

Erlinda has been a member of PMPC for six years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business and make it a convenience store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

loans.name: Lourdes' Group

texts.en:
Lourdes is 60 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 5 children. 

Lourdes has a general store where she sells groceries and other consumable products. She has had this business for 10 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 5000 to purchase more stocks for her general store.

Lourdes has been a member of PMPC for almost a year.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business. Lourdes is the leader of a three-person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has her own business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks for her general store

loans.name: Venancia

texts.en:
Venancia is married with four children. She is 58 years old and lives in Balintawak, Aurora Zamboanga Del Sur.

Venancia is a farmer who grows flowers to earn a living. She has been doing this for 12 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 35,000 to purchase fertilizers for her flower garden. 

She has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, Venancia hopes to become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for her flower farm

loans.name: Elda

texts.en:
Elda is married with 6 children. She is 43 years old and lives in Camanse, Sinacaban.

Elda is a farmer who grows fruit and vegetable crops to earn a living. She has been doing this for 3 years. Elda has requested a loan of PHP 4000 to purchase additional fertilizers for planting crops. 

Elda has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, she hopes to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers for planting crops

loans.name: Toirkhon

texts.ru: Тоирхон проживает в городе Куляб. Ему 44 года. Он женат. У него 8 детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Тоирхон занимается перевозками на своем мотороллере. Этим видом деятельности занимается десять лет. Кредит берет для ремонта мотороллера и ремонта своего дома.
texts.en: Toirkhon lives in the city of Kulob.  He is 44 years old, married and has eight children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Toirkhon is involved in providing transportation services using his scooter.  He has been in this business for ten years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his scooter and his house.

loans.use: to repair his scooter and house

loans.name: Amalyn

texts.en: Amalyn is married with one child. She is 31 years old and lives in Galingon, Tampilisan, Zamboanga del Norte. Amalyn is a farmer and raises rubber crops to earn a living. She had requested a loan of 10000 to purchase fertilizer and other equipment for her rubber plant. Amalyn has been a member of PMPC for 1 year. In the future, Amalyn hopes to expand her land to plant and grow additional rubber.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and equipment for her rubber plant

loans.name: Luchando A Lograr Group

texts.es:
El comité LUCHANDO A LOGRAR, se formo hace 2 años,  está integrado por 19 señoras.  El comité fue constituido con la idea de poder ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del trabajo en conjunto de todas ellas. Son personas muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante.
Aida es una persona muy trabajadora y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y comenta que por medio de la venta de perfume que hace ha podido ayudar a su familia y darles todo lo que necesitan para un mejor estilo de vida. Su meta es poder tener una tienda grande donde poder ofrecer una gran variedad a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de perfumes, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Ella está muy agradecida por la ayuda que está recibiendo de Kiva y de fundación paraguaya.
texts.en:
The “Luchando a Lograr” (Striving to Achieve) committee came together two years ago.  It’s composed of 19 women.  The committee was formed with the idea of being able to help each other by means of their teamwork.  They are all very hardworking people with a strong wish to get ahead.

Aída is a very hardworking person who very much wants to get ahead and she comments that through the sale of perfume she’s been able to help her family and to give them everything they need for a better lifestyle.  Her goal is to be able to have a large store wherein she can offer a great variety to her customers.

She is asking for the loan to buy perfume to stock up and meet customer demand.  She is very grateful for the help she’s getting from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy perfume to sell.

loans.name: Gladis Melva

texts.es:
La señora Gladis nació en la ciudad del Cusco – Perú, ahora tiene 50 años de edad, es viuda  y tiene 2 hijos que son estudiantes que dependen de ella.

Su actividad económica principal es la ferretería, ella  comercialización de artículos de ferretería y todo lo referente a materiales y accesorios de construcción.

Ella trabaja todos los días en su establecimiento ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián de la ciudad del Cusco, ella quiere que su actividad y su tienda crezca para poder dejarles algo a sus hijos.

En esta oportunidad La Señora Gladis necesita hacer un préstamo para comprar más mercadería y surtir su negocio, ya que la competencia en este sector comercial de la ciudad se ha incrementado.

La señora Gladis pertenece al Banco comunal “San Rafael” de la Ciudad del Cusco.
texts.en:
Gladis was born in the city of Cusco, Peru. She is now 50 years old, a widow and has 2 children who are students that depend on her. Her main business activity is hardware: she sells items of hardware and everything relating to construction materials and accessories. She works everyday in her shop located in the San Sebastián district of the city of Cusco.

She wants her activity and her store to grow in order to leave something to her children. At this time, Gladis needs a loan to buy more merchandise and stock her business, as competition in this commercial sector of the city has increased. 

Gladis belongs to the San Rafael communal bank in the city of Cusco.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her hardware store.

loans.name: Dina  Doris

texts.es:
La Sra. Dina ahora tiene 35 años de edad, la socia es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos pequeños, Dina trabaja como cocinera para una agencia de turismo, pero adicionalmente ella tiene un bazar comercial en su domicilio, vende productos variados, desde artículos de oficina y pasamanería hasta, adornos para la casa etc. en la ciudad de Cusco.

La Sra. Dina solicita este préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería y artículos para su bazar, La socia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.

La Sra. Dina pertenece al banco comunal ”LAS TRIUNFADORAS”; El banco comunal se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Andahuaylillas en la provincia de Quispicanchis y departamento de Cusco.
texts.en:
Dina is now 35 years old, lives with her partner and has two small children.  Dina works as a cook for a tourism agency, but additionally has a commercial bazaar in her home. She sells various products, from office items and passementerie to house decorations, etc., in the city of Cusco.

Dina requests this loan to invest in buying merchandise and items for her bazaar. She is grateful for the loan and promises to pay her installments in accordance with the schedule of payments.

Dina belongs to the "Los Triunfadoras" communal bank, located in Andahuaylillas district, in Quispicanchis province, in Cusco department.

loans.use: To buy items for her bazaar.

loans.name: Daniel Omar

texts.en:
Daniel Omar is a 24-year-old chef in a touristic restaurant in Cusco.  He prepares dishes that are both international and regional in nature.  He has had this job for more than two years and says that one of his favorite dishes to prepare is Peruvian ceviche (a seafood dish typically made of fresh raw fish marinated in citric juices).

In addition, Daniel Omar and his girlfriend have been running a business, selling artisanal handicrafts for three years.  A loan will help him purchase more merchandise from Cusco and Lima such as woven earrings, necklaces and bracelets.

Meanwhile, Daniel Omar is also collaborating with his sister to open a restaurant serving Peruvian rotisserie chicken near the popular tourist attraction of Macchu Picchu.  In the future, Daniel would like to open a restaurant where he can serve both Peruvian and international cuisine.

Daniel Omar is receiving an individual loan as a member of the village bank "El Sr de los Temblores III" in Cusco, which is located in the Andean mountains at 3,400 meters above sea level.  The bank is in its first cycle with Asociación Arariwa, although some group members were previously members of other village banks.

loans.use: to purchase artisanal jewelry such as woven earrings, necklaces and bracelets.

loans.name: Tania Gladys

texts.es: La socia Tania sigue participando en el banco comunal “Virgen Estrella de Oropesa” de la Asociación Arariwa, la socia sigue elaborando y vendiendo panes chutas en el distrito de Oropesa.  Con el anterior préstamo la socia pudo incrementar el capital del negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo manteca, azúcar y harina al por mayor. La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Tania continues participating in the Virgen Estrella de Oropesa communal bank of Asociación Arariwa.  She continues making and selling "chuta" bread [a large and flat round loaf made locally] in the district of Oropesa.  With the previous loan she was able to increase her business capital.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies such as lard, sugar, and flour wholesale.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as lard, sugar, and flour wholesale.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es:
Gabriela ahora tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y tiene 2 hijos; Su actividad de la señora Gabriela es la venta de comida en el mercado, además de esto ella tiene una heladería en su domicilio. De esta manera se gana la vida alternando su comercio en el mercado y simultáneamente su heladería.

Gabriela requiere mucho de un préstamo ya que necesita implementar su heladería y comprar insumos y mobiliario, además de insumos para su comercio en el mercado. Ella espera poner un restaurante lo mas antes posible y así juntar en un solo lugar sus 2 actividades.

Nuestra socia agradece y valora el préstamo otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el tiempo establecido como ya lo había hecho anteriormente, porque sabe que esta ayuda es muy importante para ella.

La socia Gabriela; pertenece al banco comunal “LAS TRIUNFADORAS”; UBICADOS EN EL DISTRITO DE Andahuaylillas Cusco - Perú.
texts.en:
Gabriela is 44 years old now.  She is married and has two children.  Gabriela's job is selling food in the market.  Besides this she also has an ice cream shop in her home.  In this way she makes a living alternating her business in the market with her ice cream shop.

Gabriela needs a loan a lot because she needs to set up her ice cream shop and buy supplies and furniture, as well as supplies for her business in the market.  She hopes to open a restaurant as soon as possible and so move her two jobs into a single place.

Our member appreciates and values the loan granted, and she promises to make the payments in the established time, as she had done previously, because she knows that this help is very important for her.

Gabriela belongs to Las Triunfadoras Communal Bank, located in the district of Andahuaylillas, Cusco, Peru.

loans.use: to set up her ice cream shop and to buy supplies and furniture.

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
El señor Hugo nació en el Cusco – Perú, tiene 30 años de edad, es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos pequeños. Su actividad de Hugo es la venta y distribución de balones de gas domestico, actividad que viene realizando hace algún tiempo y que le ha ayudado a mantener su hogar.

Hugo en esta oportunidad solicita de un préstamo para comprar una maquina fotocopiadora, que inversión que significará otro ingreso económico más y por supuesto el fortalecimiento de su economía y mejoramiento de su familia.

Hugo con esta inversión pretende hacer crecer su negocio y seguir trabajando para asegurar su negocio y la permanencia de este.
texts.en:
Hugo was born in Cusco, Peru.  He is 30 years old, lives with his partner, and has three small children.  Hugo's work is selling and distributing cylinders of propane, a job he has been doing for some time and which has helped him support his household.

Hugo is requesting this loan to buy a photocopier, an investment that will mean an additional income and, of course, the strengthening of his finances and improvement of his family.

With this investment Hugo hopes to make his business grow and continue working to secure his business and its continuance.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Allen

texts.en: Allen is 54 years old and lives in Lawa-an, Aloran, Misamis Occidental in the Philippines, where she is married with four children. She has a store that sells a variety of products such as shampoo, soap, and more. Allen has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of 20000 to purchase more stock for her general store. Allen has been a member of PMPC for seven years, and in the future, she hopes to finish her house and to someday improve her living.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Hermilanda

texts.en:
Hermilanda is 70 years old and lives in Masabod, Clarin. She is married with 6 children. 

Hermilanda has no business but she receives an allotment from her husband of approximately PHP 40,000 each month. She has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional materials to be used to repair their house. 

Hermilanda has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, she hopes to complete her home repairs.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials to repair their house

loans.name: Ginalyn

texts.en:
Ginalyn is 37 years old and lives in Duanguican, Tudela. She is married with 3 children. 

Ginalyn has a store where she sells a variety of products. She has had this business for 8 years. Ginalyn has requested a loan of PHP 50,000 to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents. 

Ginalyn has been a member of PMPC for 7 years.  In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, beverages, and detergents.

loans.name: Gala

texts.en:
Gala is married with 1 child. She is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Gala is a farmer who grows rice to earn a living . She has been doing this for 3 years. She has requested a loan of PHP 5000 to purchase fertilizer and other products for use in farming.

Gala has been a member of PMPC for 1 month. In the future, she hopes to have a lot of rice.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizer and other products for use in farming.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is married. She is 62 years old and lives in Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte in the Philippines. For 2 years, Evangeline has been selling snack foods to earn a living. Each month, she earns 5000 doing this work. She has requested a loan of 6000 to purchase more stock for her general store. Evangeline has been a member of PMPC for two years and in the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

location.town: Liloy - Antonino, Labason, Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Fedelina

texts.en: Fedelina is married with three children. She is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. Fedelina is a farmer and has been raising pigs to earn a living for ten years. She also operates a general store, and she has requested a loan of 30,000 to purchase more stock for her store. Fedelina has been member of PMPC for two years, and in the future, she hopes to be successful in her chosen business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Rosa nació en la ciudad del Cusco – Perú, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos. Su actividad económica principal es el servicio de taxi, ella trabaja junto a su esposo en esta actividad desde hace mucho tiempo, es por ello que  ahora la señora Rosa solicita un préstamo para comprar repuestos para su vehículo, para mejorar su servicio.

La señora Rosa agradece el apoyo y sabe que con esta ayuda algún día podrá adquirir otro vehículo y mejorarán sus ingresos económicos. Ella pertenece al Banco comunal “Señor de los Temblores II” de la ciudad del Cusco - Perú.
texts.en:
Rosa was born in Cusco-Perú.  She’s 44 years old, married and has four children.  Her main economic activity is taxi service.  She has worked together with her husband in this activity for a long time and this is why Rosa is now asking for a loan to buy spare parts for her vehicle to improve service.

Rosa is grateful for the support and knows that with this help one day she will b able to acquire another vehicle and their income will improve.

She belongs to the “Señor de los Temblores II” (Lord of Earthquakes II) communal bank in the city of Cusco-Perú.

loans.use: to buy vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Emeliana

texts.en: Emeliana is 66 years old and lives in Lobogon, Aloran Misamis Occidental. She is married and has seven children. Emeliana sells a variety of fish as her business. She has had this business for 20 years. She requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase more fish to sell. Emeliana has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Emeliana hopes to save a lot of money.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to sell

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan  is 51 years old and lives in Circiaco C.Pastrano, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She is married and has five children. Susan has a junk shop where she buys recyclable materials. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of 14,900 PHP to purchase recyclable materials for her junk shop. Susan has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Susan hopes that all her children finish their education.

loans.use: to purchase recyclable materials

loans.name: Nicomedes

texts.en: Nicomedes is married and has seven children. He is 65 years old and lives in Tubod, Aloran. Nicomedes is a farmer and grows vegetable crops to earn a living. Nicomedes has been doing this for seven years. Nicomedes has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to purchase additional fertilizers such as inorganic fertilizers. Nicomedes has been a member of PMPC for a month. In the future, Nicomedes hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fertilizers

loans.name: Maximeno

texts.en:
Maximeno is married with six children. He is 71 years old and lives in Lupagan, Clarin. Maximeno is a farmer and operates a fish pond to earn a living. He has been doing this for ten years. 

Maximeno has been a member of PMPC for two years, and he has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase additional fish foods. In the future, Maximeno hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish foods for his fish pond.

loans.name: Sanginmoh

texts.ru: Сангинмох более десяти лет занимается животноводством. Она в основном закупает крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. На сегодняшний день у нее один бык и одна корова. Ей 54 года. Она замужем. У нее шестеро детей. Сангинмох берет кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Sanginmoh has been involved in animal husbandry for over ten years.  She primarily buys cattle for subsequent resale.  Today, she has one bull and one cow.  Sanginmoh is 54 years old, married and has six children.  She is requesting this loan to buy bulls.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Dustmurod

texts.ru: Дустмурод проживает в районе Бохтар. Ему 31 год. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена портниха. Сам он предоставляет услугу, такси. В этой области он два года. Кредит берет для  ремонта машины и установки оборудования для природного газа.
texts.en: Dustmurod lives in the Bohtar district.  He is 31 years old, married and has two children.  His wife is seamstress.  Dustmurod provides a taxi service.  He has been in this business for two years.  He is requesting this loan to repair his car and install natural gas equipment.

loans.use: to repair his car and install natural gas equipment

loans.name: Elisa Group

texts.en: Elisa is 48 years old and lives in Poblacion, Guipos. She is married and has three children. To earn a living, Elisa has a business selling snacks. She earns about 3,000 PHP each month doing this work. Elisa has a requested a loan of 12,000 PHP to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business. Elisa has been a member of PMPC for one year. In the future, Elisa would like to establish a carenderia (type of restaurant).

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for her snack vending business

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité “Mujeres Luchadoras” se encuentra en el quinto ciclo del programa de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundación Paraguaya, tiene 16 integrantes, de la zona de Asunción; todas las integrantes ya realizan actividades productivas, con lo cual ayudan a sus familias.
Mercedes es la presidenta del grupo, y ella nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de todas las marcas, en lo cual le va muy bien, ya que tiene muy buena clientela. Ella es reconocida en el barrio porque es muy trabajadora y luchadora Solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos de todo tipo y marcas, con lo cual podrá abastecerse y de esa forma poder seguir ofreciendo una buena variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Luchadoras” (Tenacious Women) committee is in the fifth cycle of Fundación Paraguaya’s Enterprising Women program.  It has 16 members from the Asunción area.  All the members carry out productive activities they help their families with.

Mercedes is group president.  She comments that she sells all brands of cosmetics; she does very well because she has a very good clientele.  She is known in her neighborhood because she’s very hardworking and steadfast.

She’s asking for the loan to buy all types and brands of cosmetics to stock up and be able to continue to offer a good variety to her customers.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Virgen Del Rosario Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres “Virgen del Rosario” se formo en la ciudad de Ybycui con la unión de 12 mujeres de esa ciudad, todas ellas amigas y vecinas que vieron una gran oportunidad para ellas y sus familias, y es por ello que decidieron unirse al programa de la fundación paraguaya.
Maria es manicurista y comenta que tiene una buena cantidad de clientas que siempre le piden sus servicios, gracias al empeño que ella le pone a lo que hace es que ha podido salir adelante y ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo. Su meta es poder tener un salón de belleza donde ofrecer mayor servicio a sus clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de esmaltes, limas de uñas, y demás insumos con los cuales podrá seguir trabajando y ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
The “Virgen del Rosario” committee formed in the city of Ybycui when 12 women from that city joined together.  They are all friends and neighbors who saw a great opportunity for themselves and for their families and that’s why they decided to join Fundación Paraguaya’s program.

María is a manicurist and she comments that she has a good number of customers who always request her services thanks to the dedication she puts into what she does.  She’s been able to get ahead and help her family by means of her work.  Her goal is to be able to have a beauty salon to provide better customer service.

She’s asking for the loan to buy nail polish, emery boards and other supplies to continue working and helping her family.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, emery boards, etc.

loans.name: Marylie

texts.en:
Marylie is thirty-eight years old, married, with three children, and living at Happy Valley, Tambulig, Zamboanga Del Sur. She has been a member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative for More than two years. Marylie's business is a general store. 

Marylie requested a loan amount of PHP 14,000 to purchase more stock for her general store. Marylie hopes that someday she will earn a lot from her business, allowing her to support the financial needs of her family. Through the help of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative she hopes to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is a forty-one-year-old married woman with five children aged between three and eleven years old. Her husband is a farmer.

Leonila buys and sells scrap. She started her business three years ago. Leonila earns about 5,000 PHP per month from her business. She also helps her husband grow rice on their land. Leonila wants to provide for her family's needs. She requested this loan to purchase fertilizers and more scrap to sell. She hopes for her family to have a better standard of living. She also desires to be a successful business woman someday.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and more scrap to sell.

loans.name: Ronaflor

texts.en:
Ronaflor is thirty-five years old, married, with two children aged three and nine. She has had a sari-sari store business for eleven years. She sells various items like soft drinks, eggs, and toiletries. Ronaflor also sells barbecue to her neighborhood. Her income is used for her family's basic needs, which makes it hard for her to replenish her inventory rapidly.

Ronaflor is requesting a loan to buy more barbecue ingredients and more merchandise to sell. She hopes this loan will help increase her business profitability.

loans.use: to buy more barbecue ingredients and more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 70 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 12 children. 

Leonila has a “nipa” roof making business and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month. She has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to purchase additional nipa leaves to make roofs.
 
Leonila has been a member of PMPC for almost seven years. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional supplies for her roof-making business.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela is 39 years old and lives in Carmen, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental, and she is married with five children. She has a business buying and selling bananas and earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month. 

Marcela became a member of PMPC just this year, and she has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchase more bananas for sale. In the future, Marcela hopes to acquire more land.

loans.use: to purchase more bananas for sale.

loans.name: Virgincita

texts.en:
Virgincita is forty-four years old and is a married woman with three children aged twelve, thirteen and fifteen. She does farming for a living. She has been growing rice for five years now. She also runs a sari-sari store business. Virgincita is doing her best to help provide for her family’s basic needs and send her children to school.

Virgincita has requested this loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pay for labor. She hopes to have better yield and income as a result.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is a fifty-year-old married woman with three children aged seventeen, twenty and twenty-three. Her husband is a carpenter.

Wilma has been a bamboo seller for nine years. She works hard to support her husband in providing for their family’s needs and giving their children a proper education. Wilma requested a loan to buy more bamboo to sell. This will help increase her sales and profitability. Wilma hopes to have a progressive business and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy more bamboo to sell.

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
